originalText.text: I hired Charlie’s Designs to design my residence in New York City.  I was moving into a new one bedroom apartment with mostly floor-to-ceiling windows, and the space needed a lot of creativity. Charlie was great to work with and made designing my home a fun and easy process. He made an effort to get to understand my taste and style and presented an array of product choices and suppliers that were spot on and within budget. I highly recommend Charlie’s designs for innovative concept design and professional execution.

text.text: I hired Charlie’s Designs to design my residence in New York City.  I was moving into a new one bedroom apartment with mostly floor-to-ceiling windows, and the space needed a lot of creativity. Charlie was great to work with and made designing my home a fun and easy process. He made an effort to get to understand my taste and style and presented an array of product choices and suppliers that were spot on and within budget. I highly recommend Charlie’s designs for innovative concept design and professional execution.

originalText.text: Having finally bough my first property, I really needed to decorate it in a way to “truly make it my own”. Charlie was fantastic at interpreting and manifesting my expressed desire for clean, contemporary and minimalist design. Since the apartment had been finalized, I have had many visitors and everyone has been absolutely impressed with Charlie’s work. I too on daily basis enjoy the soothing quality of the decor. It’s calming quality changes throughout the day, but it is especially beautiful in the early morning light. I highly recommend Charlie’s Designs for anyone looking to make their living space a warm and comforting one.

originalText.text:
We worked with Charlie's Designs LLC on the interior design of our theater, located in the Lower East Side of Manhattan, from 2019 to 2020. During this time the team helped us choose the flooring, lighting, color schemes, carpet and all other aspects of our interior design project. With Charlie’s assistance our venue has become a modern and contemporary space. He listened to our ideas, but also brought his own original thoughts to the table, creating a timeless look for us and our audience. It is notable that Charlie always kept our budget in mind and came up with a creative solution that not only kept our costs down, but also helped our theater stand out. Furthermore, he worked effectively with our contractor always making time to be available to get the job done efficiently and professionally.

We would strongly recommend Charlie's Designs LLC to handle your commercial interior design projects. We have had many compliments on our theater renovation.

originalText.text:
Moving back home to New York was a dream realized.  Part of that plan was making my sure my newly purchased place was completely “done.” The process of searching for designers was unpleasant and left me feeling flat.

Until I found Charlie Bolivar.

I could not have asked for a better person to lead the process in creating a space I love.  Charlie is patient and dedicated.  And even more is tirelessly available and supportive of every concern and question I had.  Make no mistake, while he has a gentle style, he’ll clearly assert his opinion on a design matter and likely he’s absolutely right.  There are many times when I was unsure or insecure about what I had chosen — not only did he reassure me — he constantly reinforced that I needed to not only be comfortable with our choices, but completely happy!   If you want a true partner with a point of view but who will honor and respect your choices, Charlie of Charlie’s Designs is your guy!

I can’t wait to work with him again!

originalText.text: Charlie's Design's is a very professional friendly interior design company.  I had the pleasure of working with Charlie to select items for my living room and bedroom.  He has great style, very responsive, and has a great eye to pull everything together from large pieces to accent accessories.  Highly recommend him.
